title: Refraction, surface tension, and speed of sound: Refractive index (Na D-line)

components.name: 1-butyl-3-methylimidazolium tetrafluoroborate
sample: 0.08 halide impurity mass %(dried by vacuum heating)

ref.title: Density and Refractive Index for Binary Systems of the Ionic Liquid [Bmim][BF4] with Methanol, 1,3-Dichloropropane, and Dimethyl Carbonate
